newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 31.209 (31.114).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 31.209 (31.114).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 31.209 to the dollar after Wednesday's fixing at 31.114, and at 20.369 to the mark from 20.409.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at exactly 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.42 percent, after a deviation of -0.42 percent on Wednesday.
